description:
As a user
  I want to find job opportunities on the EPAM career site
  So that I can the open positions
name: Search functionality

elements.name: 1. Quick UI check for search form

steps.name: the EPAM career page is opened
the search form should be displayed
the SRL should be hidden
the placeholder should be displayed
the location drop-down should be displayed
the skill drop-down should be displayed
the find button should be displayed
the EPAM career page is opened
the search form should be displayed
the SRL should be hidden
the keyword Java Developer is entered
the skill drop-down is opened
the skill Software Engineering is selected
the Find button is clicked
the SRL should be displayed
the title of the first position should be: Java Developer
the location of the first position should be: BUDAPEST, HUNGARY

the description of the first position should be: Currently we are looking for a Java Developer for our Budapest office to make the team even stronger. In Hungary currently 1400+ IT Engineers help the world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer and deliver software...
the EPAM career page is opened
the search form should be displayed
the SRL should be hidden
the keyword 18374 is entered
the skill drop-down is opened
the skill Software Engineering is selected
the Find button is clicked
the SRL should be displayed
the title of the first position should be: .NET (Web Application) Developer
the location of the first position should be: BUDAPEST, HUNGARY

the description of the first position should be: Currently we are looking for a .NET (Web Application) Developer for our Budapest office to make the team even stronger. In Hungary currently 1400+ IT Engineers help the world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer and...
the EPAM career page is opened
the search form should be displayed
the SRL should be hidden
the keyword * is entered
the Find button is clicked
there should be 0 results message on the SRL
the EPAM career page is opened
the search form should be displayed
the SRL should be hidden
the keyword lorem ipsum is entered
the Find button is clicked
there should be 0 results message on the SRL

description:
As a user
  I want to open a job opportunity on the EPAM career site
  So that I can see the details of the selected job
name: Job page UI

elements.name: 1. Open a job page from career page and back

steps.name: the EPAM career page is opened
the keyword Java Developer is entered
the Find button is clicked
the apply button should be displayed
the apply button is clicked
the title of the page should be: Java Developer
the Careers navigation link is clicked
the search form should be displayed

elements.name: 2.A Open a job page from URL and check UI

steps.name: the following job url https://www.epam.com/careers/job-listings/job.42288 is opened
the apply form should be displayed
the title of the page should be: Web Portal Business Analyst
the location of the job should be: Dubai, UAE
the job ID should be: JOB #: 42288
the hot label should be displayed
the relocation label should be displayed

elements.name: 2.B Open a job page from URL and check UI

steps.name: the following job url https://www.epam.com/careers/job-listings/job.24522 is opened
the apply form should be displayed
the title of the page should be: Senior Business Analyst
the location of the job should be: Atyrau, Kazakhstan
the job ID should be: JOB #: 24522
the hot label should be hidden
the relocation label should be displayed

elements.name: 2.C Open a job page from URL and check UI

steps.name: the following job url https://www.epam.com/careers/job-listings/job.30832 is opened
the apply form should be displayed
the title of the page should be: Talent Acquisition Sourcing Expert
the location of the job should be: Monterrey, NL, Mexico
the job ID should be: JOB #: 30832
the hot label should be displayed
the relocation label should be hidden

elements.name: 2.D Open a job page from URL and check UI

steps.name: the following job url https://www.epam.com/careers/job-listings/job.42456 is opened
the apply form should be displayed
the title of the page should be: Delivery Manager
the location of the job should be: Brussels, Belgium
the job ID should be: JOB #: 42456
the hot label should be hidden
the relocation label should be hidden
